t: A song of ascents. Of David.
Lord,*spn my heart is not proud; my*ln eyes are not haughty. I*ln do not get involved with things too*ln great or too wondrous for me.
Instead,*ln I have calmed and quieted my soul like*ln a weaned child with its mother; my*ln soul is like a weaned child.
Israel,*pn put your hope in the Lord,*s both*ln now and forever.
